trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellStateChanged"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representerar den metod som hanterar den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellStateChanged"> </xref> händelsen för en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellStateChanged> event occurs when a cell state changes, such as when the cell loses or gains focus.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellStateChanged>händelsen inträffar när cellens status ändras, till exempel när förlorar eller får fokus.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellStateChanged>

trans-unit.source: When you create a DataGridViewCellStateChangedEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: När du skapar en DataGridViewCellStateChangedEventHandler delegat kan identifiera den metod som hanterar händelsen.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Lägga till en instans av delegaten händelsen om du vill associera händelsen med din händelsehanterare.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Händelsehanteraren anropas när händelsen inträffar, om du tar bort delegaten.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Läs mer om händelsehanteraren delegater [NIB: händelser och delegater](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
